  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    EmptyBothDeckException
    An exception class that is thrown when both the gold deck and the resource deck are empty.
    EmptyDeckException
    Exception class to be thrown when attempting to draw a card from an empty deck.
    FullHandException
    Custom exception class for when a player's hand is full.
    GameModelAlreadyCreatedException
    The GameModelAlreadyCreatedException is thrown when an attempt is made to create a new GameModel instance when one already exists.
    GUISceneInitializationException
     
    IllegalPlaceCardException
    This exception is thrown when a card cannot be placed.
    IllegalStateOperationException
    Custom exception class for representing an illegal state operation in the game.
    InvalidCardDraw
    Custom exception class for representing an invalid card draw in the game.
    LastPlayerRemainedException
    This class represents a custom exception that is thrown when the remains only one player in the game.
    MaxPlayerNumberReachedException
    This exception is thrown when the maximum number of players has been reached in a game.
    NoFileCreatedException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when a file cannot be created.
    NoGamesException
    Custom exception class indicating that a game is not present in the controller.
    NoTokenException
    NoTokenException is an exception class that is thrown when a token is not found.
    ObjectiveCardNotChosenException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when a player tries to play their starter card without choosing an objective card first.
    PlayerNicknameAlreadyExistsException
    Exception thrown when a player's nickname already exists.
    PlayerNumberAlreadySetException
    This exception is thrown when the player number has already been set.
    PlayerNumberNotReachedException
    Exception thrown when the player number has not been reached.
    WrongIndexSelectedCard
    This exception is launched if the index selected is not valid.
